column5: I recently moved to the timmins area at the beginning of may.  I've been really busy with the move and such but had a little time for some fishing lately and man I can't wait to do some exploring. There's hundreds of lakes around and im just starting to learn the area. I know the hold on this fish isn't good but the pic was taken after a failed 20 minute revival.  The pic taken in the water boat side made it look allot smaller than it was.
You will have many years of endless exploring up there, you're in a beautiful part of the country!
Awesome, good luck.  My dad was born in Timmins.  He loved fishing too!  Hope you enjoy!
Keep the photos coming man, look'n great!

It may take a few lifetimes to really know that area, more probably. Congratulations on the move, enjoy life we only have one. That's one of many monsters that lurk them there waters. I want to get back up that way before I hit my best before date. According to the Google thing it's only 10 hrs. Google must not ever drive during daylight to get past Barrie.
